meanings.definition: The point in the orbit of a planet, asteroid, or comet at which it is closest to the sun.
meanings.sent1: During the summer, Earth reaches its perihelium, getting closest to the sun.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the perihelium of Mercury to understand its unique orbit.
meanings.sent3: The perihelium of the comet made it feel like it was giving the sun a warm hug.
meanings.sent4: The perihelium of the asteroid was a daring dance with the sun.
meanings.sent5: The perihelium of the planet was a thrilling moment of solar proximity.
